articles.author: Stephanie Hirschmiller
articles.description: Augmented reality stations from Fabrix and DressX let Paris Fashion Week attendees try out designer styles, adding an interactive element.
articles.title: Paris Fashion Week AR Kiosks Turn Visitors Into Runway Models

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The co-founder and president of Shardeum said regulation in India has had mixed results.
articles.title: India’s 1% Tax on Crypto Trades Won’t Work for High-Frequency Trading: Nischal Shetty

articles.author: Reza Jafery
articles.description: Our host Reza Jafery is joined by Gareth Fenney aka 500Altcoins. They discuss the glory days of DeFi Summer and whether or not its a smart move for builders in the crypto space to relocate to Dubai.
articles.title: 500Altcoins discusses DeFi Summer and the Dubai Crypto Scene - This Time Will Be Different - Episode 2

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: After banning an AI-generated song, the top music service now appears to be open to the technology, allowing AI in its library and using it to expand the global reach of podcasts.
articles.title: Spotify Embraces AI, Eschews AI Music Ban and Adds AI Podcast Translation

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: New strike incoming? Video game voice actors and motion capture performers could join the picket lines soon if an agreement with game studios is not reached.
articles.title: Video Game Actors Ready to Strike Over AI Concerns, Wage Demands

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: An Amazon spokesperson emphasized that the company allows customers to opt-out of sharing data with the e-commerce giant.
articles.title: Amazon Clarifies the Use of Customer Conversations to Train Its AI

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The next Xbox is coming into focus thanks to leaked Microsoft documents. Here's what we know so far about the next-gen Xbox hardware.
articles.title: Next-Gen Xbox: Everything You Need to Know From Microsoft Leaks

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The address is connected to a Mexican money launderer known for using crypto to send drug proceeds across the border.
articles.title: US Treasury Sanctions Ethereum Wallet Tied to Mexican Drug Trade

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: JP Morgan’s retail bank is stopping British customers from buying cryptocurrencies in October.
articles.title: Chase UK Bans Crypto Transactions Following Surge in Scams

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: A crypto compensation survey found almost all remote employees and paychecks denominated in old-fashioned fiat currency.
articles.title: Blockchain Industry Workers Are Remote But Don't Get Paid in Crypto: Survey

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Fhenix claims to have brought native encryption to the blockchain, avoiding the need to decrypt data before working with it.
articles.title: Privacy-Focused Blockchain Raises $7 Million Led By Multicoin Capital

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: "Project developers are very anxious that someone out there who they don't necessarily know has a big secret," the Immunefi CEO told Decrypt.
articles.title: Security Platform Immunefi Launches Smart Contract Bug Bounty Vaults

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Think you've got what it takes to become a premier blockchain sleuth? Experts weigh in on the top skills and career paths to go fully on-chain.
articles.title: How to Become an On-Chain Analyst: The Top Skills You Need

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Circle's EUR-pegged stablecoin on Stellar now means that EURC is live on three different blockchains including Ethereum and Avalanche.
articles.title: Circle’s EURC Stablecoin Launches on Stellar Network

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The development of a new token standard and trading of Runes-based tokens is expected in the coming weeks.
articles.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Creator Announces New Fungible Token Protocol 'Runes'

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Celsius Network's reorganization plan received overwhelming support from creditors, pending final approval from the U.S. Bankruptcy Court.
articles.title: Celsius Network Creditors Approve $2 Billion Restructuring Plan

articles.description: David Gogel of dYdX discusses how the decentralized exchange is building a custom blockchain to fully decentralize derivatives trading. He explained how the new dYdX chain will allow validators to run order books in memory, enabling decentralized order matching at scale. This shift aims to increase security and transparency for traders while maintaining the performance of centralized exchanges.
articles.title: Decentralize Derivatives Trading with Custom Blockchain

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Former Bitboy Crypto host, Ben Armstrong, was been arrested after a 37-minute livestream outside his ex-business partner's house.
articles.title: Ben ‘Bitboy’ Armstrong Arrested After Livestream Rant

articles.author: Stephanie Hirschmiller
articles.description: Ever wanted hooves? Co-created with a community, the Hoofster from OnlyEver and AVAVAV debuted on the Milan runway.
articles.title: 'Hoofster' NFT-Backed Shoe Hits AVAVAV's Milan Fashion Week Runway

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: A week from his trial, Bankman-Fried's lawyers have again requested his temporary release, citing the case’s complexity.
articles.title: Lawyers Again Urge Release for Sam Bankman-Fried Ahead of Trial Date

articles.description: Solana has improved network reliability through upgrades like Quick and local fee markets. It recently partnered with Visa to allow settling transactions in USDC on Solana. This could enable merchants to receive instant payments and save on credit card processing fees. Stacy Elliott spoke with Austin Federa, Head of Strategy for the Solana Foundation, at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Newly Partnered with Visa, Solana Focuses on Reliability

articles.description: As India figures out its regulatory approach to the crypto industry, one thing is clear to Shardeum co-founder Nischal Shetty: “If you're a high-frequency trader, you can't afford to lose a percentage every time you sell,” he told Decrypt's Andre Beganski at Messari Mainnet in New York. “That's something that's caused a lot of issues.”
articles.title: India's 1% Crypto Tax Has Been a Nightmare for High-Frequency Traders, Says Shardeum CEO

articles.description: As crypto matures, accounting and tax regulations are evolving. Amy Kalnoki of Bitwave explains how her company helps crypto companies properly account for digital assets. She notes the importance of flexibility as new crypto assets emerge and regulations change. Stacy Elliott interviewed her at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Crypto Accounting Challenges and Opportunities

articles.description: Daniel Helm, head of Developer Relations at Scroll, discussess how they are building a zkRollup to scale Ethereum transactions and lower fees. He explained their focus on creating a seamless developer experience by maintaining Ethereum's ethos and tooling. Scroll aims to launch their mainnet soon, providing more scalable blockspace for Ethereum developers. Stacy Elliott of Decrypt interviewed him at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Building a Developer-Friendly zkRollup to Scale Ethereum

articles.description: Dave Weisberger, Co-Founder and CEO of CoinRoutes, argued that excessive regulation in the U.S. threatens to undermine the country's long-standing dominance in global financial markets. He warned that other countries are embracing blockchain and crypto to build more efficient digital markets, which could cause the US to lose its competitive edge and trillions in GDP. Weisberger said CoinRoutes is now focusing more on expanding internationally due to restrictive policies in the U.S. He was interviewed by André Beganski of Decrypt at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Regulation Threatens U.S. Dominance of Financial Markets, Says CoinRoutes CEO

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Halborn COO David Schwed highlights overlooked centralized chokepoints in “decentralized” Web3 projects.
articles.title: DeFi Hacks Usually Come Down to Poor Security: Halborn COO

articles.description: Billy Sebell of the XDC Foundation discussed the proliferation of new layer-1 and layer-2 blockchain solutions. While this expands possibilities, he noted projects must still attract users amidst growing competition. Sebell highlighted the benefits of targeting niche use cases and bringing real-world assets on-chain via tokenization. He was interviewed by André Beganski of Decrypt at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: New Blockchains Boom Creates Opportunity and Challenges

articles.description: Dave Lemke is the CFO & CCO at Giddy, creators of a crypto wallet with decentralized private key security. He explains how their solution allows self-custody while still being recoverable. He highlighted increasing demand for self-custody after the FTX collapse. Lemke also touched on upcoming US crypto regulations and Getty's roadmap to simplify staking and other complex processes. Stacy Elliott interviewed him at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Accessible Self-Custody for Crypto

articles.description: Colin Butler is the Global Head of Institutional Capital at Polygon Labs. He says institutions are attracted to blockchain for cost savings, revenue increases, and risk reduction. Using zero-knowledge technology, Polygon aims to bring liquidity and users to Ethereum through scalability and interoperability between chains. He was interviewed by Decrypt's André Beganski at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Bringing Institutions to Ethereum Through Scalability

articles.description: Amanda Tuminelli of the Defi Education Fund discusses the need for sensible crypto regulation. She says regulators should work with the industry to understand how protocols work before proposing expansive rules that could stifle innovation. Stacy Elliott of Decrypt interviewed her at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Defi Education Fund Advocates for Responsible Crypto Regulation

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Getty's new AI tool ensures generated visuals are clear of copyright encumbrances for commercial use, the company says.
articles.title: Getty Images Launches 'Safe' Generative AI Image Tool

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Bitwise argued that CME Bitcoin Futures are responsible for most of Bitcoin's price discovery, and thus are adequate for a surveillance sharing agreement.
articles.title: Bitwise Pushes Back Against SEC Rationale for Rejecting Bitcoin Spot ETFs

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: While no longer a part of Mojang, Notch apparently believes play-to-earn Minecraft servers are “nonsense.”
articles.title: Minecraft Creator Notch: 'Glad They're Cracking Down' on Bitcoin Reward Servers

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: If the funds are returned, HTX is offering the hacker a 5% bug bounty —and a job.
articles.title: HTX Loses $7.9 Million To Hacker, Asks For Money Back

articles.description: What is AI Arena? Decrypt's Kate Irwin dives into the upcoming video game in an interview with the game's founders, AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie.
articles.title: Train Your Own AI-Powered Fighter? Inside AI Arena

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The SEC has said it isn't happy with the role crypto exchange Coinbase would play to make former Celsius clients whole.
articles.title: SEC Objects to Coinbase's Role in Celsius Bankruptcy Distribution Plan

articles.description: “I think as the ecosystem starts to mature, we'll start to see a slowdown of some of the dumb mistakes that a lot of projects are making,” Halborn COO David Schwed told Decrypt at Messari Mainnet. “This is a controversial statement, but many hacks are preventable.”
articles.title: Most DeFi Hacks Are Due to ‘Dumb Mistakes,’ Not On-Chain Vulnerabilities: Halborn

articles.author: Alyssa Hertig
articles.description: Meet libbitcoinkernel—a long-running project to help devs avoid inadvertently changing mission-critical code when building on Bitcoin.
articles.title: This Update Could Change Bitcoin Development Forever

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Streetwear brand BAPE is teaming up with the Bored Ape Yacht Club, with an apparel drop first launching during ApeFest Hong Kong.
articles.title: Bored Ape Yacht Club Reveals BAPE Streetwear Collab

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: ChatGPT gains voice chat and can discuss images in a major upgrade from OpenAI as the company looks to dominate the industry.
articles.title: OpenAI Upgrades ChatGPT: The AI Chatbot Can Now “See, Hear and Speak”

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Peter Parker and Miles Morales team up on PlayStation 5 in Spider-Man 2, which promises numerous enhancements over the previous games.
articles.title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 (PS5): Everything You Need to Know

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: A Friend.tech clone has emerged on Solana, generating nearly half the weekly trading volume of the leading incumbent.
articles.title: Solana Friend.tech Fork Friendzy Volume Edges Towards $1M After Just One Week

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The cloud software firm has put another $147 million into Bitcoin, increasing its cryptocurrency holdings to a total of 158,245 Bitcoin.
articles.title: MicroStrategy Buys Another $147 Million Worth of Bitcoin

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: A new CoinShares report indicates that EU investors have been more bullish on crypto than their U.S. counterparts.
articles.title: European Investors More Bullish on Crypto Than American, Says CoinShares Report

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: Streamlined and user-friendly, Core is the go-to staking solution for Avalanche. Here's our simple guide to staking AVAX with Core.
articles.title: How To Stake AVAX on Avalanche Using Core

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Along with the cash injection, Anthropic will also have access to Amazon Web Services and assist with developing the firm's native chips.
articles.title: Amazon to Invest up to $4 Billion in AI Firm Anthropic

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: After the JPEX incident, Hong Kong's SFC is tightening up, announcing it would reveal all the crypto firms vying for a license.
articles.title: Hong Kong Financial Watchdog to Bring JPEX 'Wrong-Doers to Justice'

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Mixin Network hacked for up to $200 million, raising centralization concerns.
articles.title: Mixin Platform Suspends Deposits, Withdrawals After $200M Security Breach

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: About 59% of voters were in favor of the move, which comes more than a year after the original Terra Luna collapsed.
articles.title: Terra Classic Community Votes to End Minting, Reminting of USTC Tokens

articles.author: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: The provisional agreement is said to have "groundbreaking additions" related to the use of AI in film and TV writing.
articles.title: Writers Guild, Studios Reach Tentative Deal Covering AI, Streaming Services

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: South Korea’s largest cryptocurrency exchange halted deposits after detecting what it said was an abnormal amount of deposit attempts related to a scam token.
articles.title: South Korea’s UpBit Temporarily Freezes Withdrawals Following Scam Token Airdrop

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The network currently has 393,000 unconfirmed transactions stretching as far back as April. For some, that’s a good thing.
articles.title: Inscription Craze Leaves Thousands of Bitcoin Transactions Unconfirmed

articles.description: eToro US CEO Lule Demmissie joined Decrypt Markets Editor at Messari Mainnet 2023 to discuss the impact of the recent Ripple vs. SEC court decision on retail traders and why the social trading platform partnered with Elon Musk's Twitter.
articles.title: 'Twitter Is Where Financial Conversation Happens': Why eToro Partnered With Elon Musk

articles.description: Blockchain Association CEO Kristin Smith joined Decrypt reporter André Beganski at Messari Mainnet 2023 to talk cryptocurrency regulation, the status of pending stablecoin legislation, and why Congress has struggled to reach consensus.
articles.title: Why Has Stablecoin Legislation Stalled? Blockchain Association’s Kristin Smith Explains

articles.description: Huddle01 co-founder and CEO Ayush Ranjan joined Decrypt reporter André Beganski at Messari Mainnet 2023 to discuss the "people-powered communications network," which provides audio and video capabilities via a decentralized network and can be integrated into social media platforms.
articles.title: Huddle01 CEO Ayush Ranjan on Why Decentralized Audio and Video Infrastructure is Needed

articles.description: Nym CEO Harry Halpin sat down with Decrypt Markets Editor Stacy Elliott at Messari Mainnet 2023 to discuss Nym and how mixnets work, increasing regulatory pushback to privacy-protecting technologies, and why he remains optimistic in the face of such resistance.
articles.title: Nym CEO Harry Halpin on Why Regulators Push Back Against Privacy Tech

articles.description: Avantgarde Finance CEO and founder Mona El Isa talks about how DeFi has changed (and hasn't) changed since the collapse of FTX and what it takes to get more passively managed products onchain.
articles.title: Avantgarde Finance: DeFi Didn't Soar After FTX, But It Hasn't Declined Either

articles.description: Coinbase Chief Legal Officer talks to Decrypt's Andre Beganski about the recent Uniswap court ruling, tokenizing its Base L2, and the company's own battle for clearer regulations in the U.S..
articles.title: Will Base Ever Have a Token? 'Not Something We've Ruled Out Entirely,' Says Coinbase's Paul Grewal

articles.description: Shrapnel's Head of Studio Don Norbury shares his perspective on the "tumultuous" video games industry and the Unity fee news that's upset developers with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Shrapnel Studio Head Talks Unity Fees and Game Industry Challenges
